game.name: Potato Chips Maker
game.description:
In this one of the best cooking games for girls, Potato Chips Maker is going to provide you fun and excitement in a high proportion. There are lots to be learned here whether you are a small kid, a teen or a grown-up. Join the Potato Chips Maker and get ready to dive into the world of amazing entertainment! You have to play the role of a popular manufacturer of the delicious potato chips of the town. We are sure that you will be happy to take this responsibility and wear the crown of being the best potato chips manufacturer in this free online baking simulator. 
Preparing potato chips at home requires a lot of effort and time. However, this task becomes an easy affair when you try out these online girls games. You will see all of the needful ingredients and supplies on the screen of your PC. Start with picking some lovely potatoes first from the garden of your home and get ready to try some really delicious items in your kitchen! Most of you have experience in cooking French fries, however, it may be the first time when you are going to cook the potato chips. 
This brand new HTML5 game is highly addictive and challenging, so you are advised to check out the details and instructions first to perform a good job before playing it during your spare time. Focus on your mission and get a chance to prepare a unique recipe. Remember, there are various challenges and surprises are awaiting you along the way. So, keep sorting them out to bring the fun to your home! Many more cooking games are available on our website. We hope that our all games will create a reason to visit us again and again.
